author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Moon dust is no joke: it floats, clings, and cuts like glass. Each landing sends deadly particles flying through space and scientists are still scrambling for fixes. 

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #space #moondust #moonlanding #spaceexploration
